text:
@DlaminiZuma We seen it all with  @MYANC lead government. Those #graves will be a symbol of your party. #History will judge all of you very harshly. #cANCer has no shame. The #Land issue which was a struggle slogan is no more. #Africans are suffering. #alutacontinua #COVID19
@CyrilRamaphosa
